chat.welcome.title: Welcome to HealthChat
chat.welcome.description: Your AI-powered health assistant. Ask me anything about your health, symptoms, or wellness concerns.
chat.errorMessage: I'm sorry, I encountered an error while processing your request. Please try again later.
chat.suggestions.coldVsFlu: What symptoms indicate a common cold vs. flu?
chat.suggestions.diabetes: Can you suggest a balanced diet for someone with Type 2 diabetes?
chat.suggestions.anxiety: I've been feeling anxious lately. What can I do?
chat.suggestions.backPain: What are the best exercises for lower back pain?
history.title: Your Chat History
history.noHistory: You don't have any chat history yet.
home.heroDescription: Get reliable health information, check symptoms, and receive personalized recommendations with AI-powered precision.
home.features.assistant.title: AI Health Assistant
home.features.assistant.description: Get instant answers to your health questions and concerns from our advanced AI.
home.features.symptoms.title: Symptom Checker
home.features.symptoms.description: Describe your symptoms and get information about possible conditions.
home.features.recommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
home.features.recommendations.descriptio: Receive tailored health advice based on your profile and history.
home.features.mental.title: Mental Health Support
home.features.mental.description: Access resources and guidance for managing stress, anxiety, and more.
home.ctaTitle: Ready to take control of your health?
home.ctaDescription: Your wellness journey starts with a simple conversation.
